p: Regarding the number of samples, the SINOVAC inactivated vaccine was tested in groups of 10 mice and 10 rats and in 4 cohorts of 10 monkeys ( Macaca mulatta) ( 40), while the Chadox1 nCOV-19 vaccine was only tested in groups of 5â€“8 mice and in 6 Rhesus monkeys using only 3 monkeys as controls ( Table 2) ( 39).
